variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-ipywidgets
dependencies.description: IPython widgets for the Jupyter Notebook

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependent_to.name: py-ncbi-genome-download
dependent_to.description: Scripts to download genomes from the NCBI FTP servers

dependent_to.name: py-umap-learn
dependent_to.description:
Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection (UMAP) is a dimension
reduction technique that can be used for visualisation similarly to
t-SNE, but also for general non-linear dimension reduction.

dependent_to.name: py-netket
dependent_to.description:
NetKet is an open-source project, delivering cutting-edge methods for
the study of many-body quantum systems with artificial neural networks
and machine learning techniques.

dependent_to.name: py-nara-wpe
dependent_to.description:
Background noise and signal reverberation due to reflections in an
enclosure are the two main impairments in acoustic signal processing and
far-field speech recognition. This work addresses signal dereverberation
techniques based on WPE for speech recognition and other far-field
applications. WPE is a compelling algorithm to blindly dereverberate
acoustic signals based on long-term linear prediction.

dependent_to.name: py-ford
dependent_to.description:
FORD, standing for FORtran Documenter, is an automatic documentation
generator for modern Fortran programs.

dependent_to.name: py-torchmeta
dependent_to.description:
A collection of extensions and data-loaders for few-shot learning &
meta-learning in PyTorch. Torchmeta contains popular meta-learning
benchmarks, fully compatible with both torchvision and PyTorch's
DataLoader.

dependent_to.name: py-ngs-tools
dependent_to.description: Reusable tools for working with next-generation sequencing (NGS) data.

dependent_to.name: py-optuna
dependent_to.description:
Optuna is an automatic hyperparameter optimization software framework,
particularly designed for machine learning. It features an imperative,
define-by-run style user API. Thanks to our define-by-run API, the code
written with Optuna enjoys high modularity, and the user of Optuna can
dynamically construct the search spaces for the hyperparameters.

dependent_to.name: py-sierrapy
dependent_to.description: A Client of HIVdb Sierra GraphQL Webservice

dependent_to.name: py-pymatgen
dependent_to.description:
Python Materials Genomics is a robust materials analysis code that
defines core object representations for structures and molecules with
support for many electronic structure codes. It is currently the core
analysis code powering the Materials Project.

dependent_to.name: py-spacy
dependent_to.description:
spaCy is a library for advanced Natural Language Processing in Python
and Cython.

dependent_to.name: py-fitter
dependent_to.description:
fitter package provides a simple class to identify the distribution from
which a data samples is generated from. It uses 80 distributions from
Scipy and allows you to plot the results to check what is the most
probable distribution and the best parameters.

dependent_to.name: py-datalad
dependent_to.description:
data distribution geared toward scientific datasets. DataLad makes data
management and data distribution more accessible. To do that, it stands
on the shoulders of Git and Git-annex to deliver a decentralized system
for data exchange. This includes automated ingestion of data from online
portals and exposing it in readily usable form as Git(-annex)
repositories, so-called datasets. The actual data storage and permission
management, however, remains with the original data providers.

dependent_to.name: py-abcpy
dependent_to.description:
ABCpy is a highly modular, scientific library for approximate Bayesian
computation (ABC) written in Python. It is designed to run all included
ABC algorithms in parallel, either using multiple cores of a single
computer or using an Apache Spark or MPI enabled cluster.

dependent_to.name: py-glmsingle
dependent_to.description: A toolbox for accurate single-trial estimates in fMRI time-series data.

dependent_to.name: py-matminer
dependent_to.description:
Matminer is a library for performing data mining in the field of
materials science.

dependent_to.name: cellpose
dependent_to.description:
A generalist algorithm for cell and nucleus segmentation that can be
optimized for your own data

dependent_to.name: py-gtdbtk
dependent_to.description:
GTDB-Tk is a software toolkit for assigning objective taxonomic
classifications to bacterial and archaeal genomes based on the Genome
Database Taxonomy (GTDB).

dependent_to.name: py-dipy
dependent_to.description:
Diffusion MRI utilities in python. DIPY is the paragon 3D/4D+ imaging
library in Python. Contains generic methods for spatial normalization,
signal processing, machine learning, statistical analysis and
visualization of medical images. Additionally, it contains specialized
methods for computational anatomy including diffusion, perfusion and
structural imaging.

dependent_to.name: py-torch-geometric
dependent_to.description:
PyTorch Geometric (PyG) is a geometric deep learning extension library
for PyTorch. It consists of various methods for deep learning on graphs
and other irregular structures, also known as geometric deep learning,
from a variety of published papers. In addition, it consists of an easy-
to-use mini-batch loader for many small and single giant graphs, multi
gpu-support, a large number of common benchmark datasets (based on
simple interfaces to create your own), and helpful transforms, both for
learning on arbitrary graphs as well as on 3D meshes or point clouds.

dependent_to.name: py-pyro-ppl
dependent_to.description: A Python library for probabilistic modeling and inference.

dependent_to.name: py-radiant-mlhub
dependent_to.description: A Python client for Radiant MLHub.

dependent_to.name: py-deepspeed
dependent_to.description:
DeepSpeed library. DeepSpeed enables world's most powerful language
models like MT-530B and BLOOM. It is an easy-to-use deep learning
optimization software suite that powers unprecedented scale and speed
for both training and inference.

dependent_to.name: py-pyedr
dependent_to.description:
Pyedr provides a means of reading a Gromacs EDR binary XDR file and
return its contents as a dictionary of NumPy arrays

dependent_to.name: py-bluepyemodel
dependent_to.description: Python library to optimize and evaluate electrical models.

dependent_to.name: py-pymc3
dependent_to.description:
PyMC3 is a Python package for Bayesian statistical modeling and
Probabilistic Machine Learning focusing on advanced Markov chain Monte
Carlo (MCMC) and variational inference (VI) algorithms. Its flexibility
and extensibility make it applicable to a large suite of problems.

dependent_to.name: py-ultralytics
dependent_to.description:
Ultralytics YOLOv8, developed by Ultralytics, is a cutting-edge, state-
of-the-art (SOTA) model that builds upon the success of previous YOLO
versions and introduces new features and improvements to further boost
performance and flexibility. YOLOv8 is designed to be fast, accurate,
and easy to use, making it an excellent choice for a wide range of
object detection, image segmentation and image classification tasks.

dependent_to.name: py-bidscoin
dependent_to.description:
Converts and organises raw MRI data-sets according to the Brain Imaging
Data Structure (BIDS).

dependent_to.name: py-torchtext
dependent_to.description: Text utilities, models, transforms, and datasets for PyTorch.

dependent_to.name: py-elephant
dependent_to.description: Elephant is a package for analysis of electrophysiology data in Python

dependent_to.name: py-drep
dependent_to.description:
dRep is a python program for rapidly comparing large numbers of genomes.
dRep can also "de-replicate" a genome set by identifying groups of
highly similar genomes and choosing the best representative genome for
each genome set.

dependent_to.name: py-smartsim
dependent_to.description:
A workflow library to easily integrate machine learning libraries with
high performance computing simulations and applications

dependent_to.name: py-pytorch-lightning
dependent_to.description: PyTorch Lightning is the lightweight PyTorch wrapper for ML researchers.

dependent_to.name: py-iopath
dependent_to.description: A library for providing I/O abstraction.

dependent_to.name: py-dgl
dependent_to.description:
Deep Graph Library (DGL). DGL is an easy-to-use, high performance and
scalable Python package for deep learning on graphs. DGL is framework
agnostic, meaning if a deep graph model is a component of an end-to-end
application, the rest of the logics can be implemented in any major
frameworks, such as PyTorch, Apache MXNet or TensorFlow.

dependent_to.name: py-templateflow
dependent_to.description: A python client to query TemplateFlow via pyBIDS.

dependent_to.name: py-opendatalab
dependent_to.description: OpenDataLab Python SDK

dependent_to.name: py-twine
dependent_to.description: Twine is a utility for publishing Python packages on PyPI.

dependent_to.name: py-openai
dependent_to.description:
The OpenAI Python library provides convenient access to the OpenAI API
from applications written in the Python language. It includes a pre-
defined set of classes for API resources that initialize themselves
dynamically from API responses which makes it compatible with a wide
range of versions of the OpenAI API.

dependent_to.name: py-hyperopt
dependent_to.description:
Hyperopt is a Python library for serial and parallel optimization over
awkward search spaces, which may include real-valued, discrete, and
conditional dimensions.

dependent_to.name: py-deephyper
dependent_to.description:
Scalable asynchronous neural architecture and hyperparameter search for
deep neural networks.

dependent_to.name: py-gluoncv
dependent_to.description:
GluonCV provides implementations of state-of-the-art (SOTA) deep
learning algorithms in computer vision. It aims to help engineers,
researchers, and students quickly prototype products, validate new ideas
and learn computer vision.

dependent_to.name: py-proglog
dependent_to.description:
Proglog is a progress logging system for Python. It allows to build
complex libraries while giving the user control on the management of
logs, callbacks and progress bars.

dependent_to.name: py-earth2mip
dependent_to.description:
Earth-2 Model Intercomparison Project (MIP). A python framework that
enables climate researchers and scientists to explore and experiment
with AI models for weather and climate.

dependent_to.name: py-nvidia-modulus
dependent_to.description: A deep learning framework for AI-driven multi-physics systems.

dependent_to.name: py-scanpy
dependent_to.description:
Scanpy is a scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression
data built jointly with anndata.

dependent_to.name: py-meldmd
dependent_to.description:
MELD is a tool for inferring the structure of biomolecules from sparse,
ambiguous, or noisy data.

dependent_to.name: py-mne
dependent_to.description: MNE python project for MEG and EEG data analysis.

dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow-datasets
dependent_to.description:
tensorflow/datasets is a library of datasets ready to use with
TensorFlow.

dependent_to.name: py-atropos
dependent_to.description:
Atropos is tool for specific, sensitive, and speedy trimming of NGS
reads. It is a fork of the venerable Cutadapt read trimmer.

dependent_to.name: candle-benchmarks
dependent_to.description: ECP-CANDLE Benchmarks

dependent_to.name: py-rbtools
dependent_to.description:
RBTools is a set of command line tools and a rich Python API for use
with Review Board.

dependent_to.name: py-deepecho
dependent_to.description:
DeepEcho is a Synthetic Data Generation Python library for mixed-type,
multivariate time series.

dependent_to.name: py-histogrammar
dependent_to.description: Composable histogram primitives for distributed data reduction.

dependent_to.name: py-panel
dependent_to.description: A high level app and dashboarding solution for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-kosh
dependent_to.description:
Kosh allows codes to store, query, share data via an easy-to-use Python
API. Kosh lies on top of Sina and can use any database backend supported
by Sina. In adition Kosh aims to make data access and sharing as simple
as possible.

dependent_to.name: py-fireworks
dependent_to.description: FireWorks stores, executes, and manages calculation workflows.

dependent_to.name: py-panaroo
dependent_to.description: A Bacterial Pangenome Analysis Pipeline

dependent_to.name: py-instrain
dependent_to.description:
inStrain is python program for analysis of co-occurring genome
populations from metagenomes that allows highly accurate genome
comparisons, analysis of coverage, microdiversity, and linkage, and
sensitive SNP detection with gene localization and synonymous non-
synonymous identification.

dependent_to.name: py-moviepy
dependent_to.description:
MoviePy is a Python module for video editing, which can be used for
basic operations (like cuts, concatenations, title insertions), video
compositing (a.k.a. non-linear editing), video processing, or to create
advanced effects. It can read and write the most common video formats,
including GIF.

dependent_to.name: py-huggingface-hub
dependent_to.description:
This library allows anyone to work with the Hub repositories: you can
clone them, create them and upload your models to them.

dependent_to.name: py-mdanalysis
dependent_to.description:
MDAnalysis is a Python toolkit to analyze molecular dynamics
trajectories generated by a wide range of popular simulation packages
including DL_Poly, CHARMM, Amber, NAMD, LAMMPS, and Gromacs. (See the
lists of supported trajectory formats and topology formats.)

dependent_to.name: py-rsatoolbox
dependent_to.description: Representational Similarity Analysis (RSA) in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-sdv
dependent_to.description:
The Synthetic Data Vault (SDV) is a Synthetic Data Generation ecosystem
of libraries that allows users to easily learn single-table, multi-table
and timeseries datasets to later on generate new Synthetic Data that has
the same format and statistical properties as the original dataset.

dependent_to.name: py-deepsig
dependent_to.description:
deep-significance: Easy and Better Significance Testing for Deep Neural
Networks

dependent_to.name: py-ytopt
dependent_to.description:
Ytopt package implements search using Random Forest (SuRF), an
autotuning search method developed within Y-Tune ECP project.

dependent_to.name: py-openpmd-viewer
dependent_to.description: Python visualization tools for openPMD files

dependent_to.name: py-ipyparallel
dependent_to.description: IPython's architecture for parallel and distributed computing.

dependent_to.name: py-papermill
dependent_to.description: Parametrize and run Jupyter and nteract Notebooks.

dependent_to.name: py-refgenconf
dependent_to.description: A Python object for standardized reference genome assets.

dependent_to.name: py-kaggle
dependent_to.description:
Official API for https://www.kaggle.com, accessible using a command line
tool implemented in Python. Beta release - Kaggle reserves the right to
modify the API functionality currently offered.

dependent_to.name: py-conan
dependent_to.description: Conan C/C++ package manager

dependent_to.name: py-segmentation-models-pytorch
dependent_to.description:
Python library with Neural Networks for Image Segmentation based on
PyTorch.

dependent_to.name: py-nltk
dependent_to.description:
The Natural Language Toolkit (NLTK) is a Python package for natural
language processing.

dependent_to.name: py-abipy
dependent_to.description: Python package to automate ABINIT calculations and analyze the results.

dependent_to.name: py-sacremoses
dependent_to.description: LGPL MosesTokenizer in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-cdsapi
dependent_to.description: Climate Data Store API.

dependent_to.name: py-lightly
dependent_to.description: A deep learning package for self-supervised learning.

dependent_to.name: py-tpot
dependent_to.description:
A Python Automated Machine Learning tool that optimizes machine
learning pipelines using genetic programming.

dependent_to.name: py-topiary-asr
dependent_to.description: Python framework for doing ancestral sequence reconstruction.

dependent_to.name: py-datasets
dependent_to.description:
Datasets is a lightweight library providing two main features: one-line
dataloaders for many public datasets and efficient data pre-processing.

dependent_to.name: py-dvc
dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.

dependent_to.name: py-torch
dependent_to.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.

dependent_to.name: py-thinc
dependent_to.description: Thinc: Practical Machine Learning for NLP in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-multiurl
dependent_to.description:
A package to download several URL as one, as well as supporting multi-
part URLs.

dependent_to.name: py-yt
dependent_to.description:
Volumetric Data Analysis yt is a python package for analyzing and
visualizing volumetric, multi-resolution data from astrophysical
simulations, radio telescopes, and a burgeoning interdisciplinary
community.

dependent_to.name: py-transformers
dependent_to.description:
State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing for TensorFlow 2.0 and
PyTorch

dependent_to.name: py-pretrainedmodels
dependent_to.description: Pretrained models for Pytorch.

dependent_to.name: gatetools
dependent_to.description: Python tools for GATE, see https://github.com/OpenGATE/Gate

dependent_to.name: py-climax
dependent_to.description: ClimaX: A foundation model for weather and climate.

dependent_to.name: py-ocp-models
dependent_to.description:
Reference implementation for the MLPerf HPC OpenCatalyst DimeNet++
benchmark

dependent_to.name: py-neurom
dependent_to.description: Python library neuron morphology analysis

dependent_to.name: py-shap
dependent_to.description:
SHAP (SHapley Additive exPlanations): a unified approach to explain the
output of any machine learning model.

dependent_to.name: py-ogb
dependent_to.description:
The Open Graph Benchmark (OGB) is a collection of benchmark datasets,
data loaders, and evaluators for graph machine learning. Datasets cover
a variety of graph machine learning tasks and real-world applications.
The OGB data loaders are fully compatible with popular graph deep
learning frameworks, including PyTorch Geometric and Deep Graph Library
(DGL). They provide automatic dataset downloading, standardized dataset
splits, and unified performance evaluation.

dependent_to.name: py-colossalai
dependent_to.description:
An integrated large-scale model training system with efficient
parallelization techniques.

dependent_to.name: py-lightning
dependent_to.description: The deep learning framework to pretrain, finetune and deploy AI models.

dependent_to.name: py-wub
dependent_to.description:
Bioinformatics tools and a software library developed by the Oxford
Nanopore Technologies Applications group.
